The report from which the above tabulations of vehicles and revenue have
been quoted has been reviewed by J. E. Greiner Company, and is considered
by them to be a thorough, comprehensive, and conservative estimate of the
traffic which it is reasonable to expect will use this crossing.

CONSTRUCTION PROCEDURE AND TIME OF COMPLETION

The estimated construction cost of this bridge is based on construction
beginning in December, 1938, and completion, ready for operation, in June
1940. The accompanying Plate 15, ‘“Progress Chart,” indicates in sequence
the time required for each phase of the project. Estimated construction
